div.p: BILL O'REILLY.COM WILL BEGIN TO TAKE ORDERS FOR KILLING JESUS
AND I THINK YOU'LL LIKE THE BOOK.
THE FACT OR TIP OF THE DAY. THE WAISTLINE BECOMES AN ISSUE.
I'M A BIG DESSERT GUY, ICE CREAM, COOKIES, YOU NAME IT.
BUT EVERY MOUTHFUL MEANS A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF SITUPS WHICH I
DO NOT LIKE. SO I CONSTANTLY SEARCH FOR GOOD
TASTING DESSERTS THAT WILL NOT PUT ME ON MY BACK FOR AN HOUR.
THERE IS A DESSERT WEBSITE THAT
I FOUND WHICH HAS GREAT STUFF. IT'S SEMI HEALTHY.
I POSTED THE WEBSITE ON BILL O'REILLY.COM.
IF YOU ARE A DESSERT PERSON, YOU MIGHT WANT TO SEEK THIS OUT.
TIP OF THE DAY. STILL HAVE TO DO SIT-UPS BUT
